name: Birds With Guns (DoctorLeaf)
description:
Welcome to Birds with Guns! Made for MiniJam 99.

How to play:

  • WASD Controls
  • Space bar to shoot.

Your aim is to dodge the attacks that the king bird sends at you, you must try and kill the king bird to become the new king!

Have fun!

Also please dont judge me this is my first game jam in unity.

-leaf
